item.title: A Capitol Rioter’s Son Is Terrified About His Father’s Release
item.description: Jackson Reffitt has been flooded with threats online since Trump pardoned his father and almost 1,600 others for their part in January 6.

item.title: Abbott Lingo Continuous Glucose Monitor Review: Easy and Clear
item.description: If you’re prediabetic, this continuous blood glucose monitor slaps right onto your arm and tells you how to eat all day.

item.description: Need to send some money without getting scammed or robbed? Follow this advice.

item.title: Trump Frees Silk Road Creator Ross Ulbricht After 11 Years in Prison
item.description: Donald Trump pardoned the creator of the world’s first dark-web drug market, who is now a libertarian cause célèbre in some parts of the crypto commun...
